name: Create Airtable records from new GetForm submissions
description:
Every time a new form is submitted in Getfrom, a new record will be created in Airtable.

The template expects your Getform form and Airtable table to have at least these fields:
1. Name
2. Email
3. Message

More information on how to create this sample form [here.](https://getform.io/installations/basic-installation)
